definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: The creature had a long nose bristling with whiskers.
sentences.chinese: 那動物有著一隻鬚毛叢生的長鼻子。

sentences.english: The hair-like vibrative receptor of the cockroach cercus is controlled by the centrifugal nerve fibers.
sentences.chinese: 蜚蠊尾鬚毛形振動感受器受離心神經纖維控制。
